entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 06:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with freezing rain early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:42 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
